source_setting.source: select n.id, nc.id, n.id, n.title, num_assignees, num_inventors, num_patents, first_seen_date, last_seen_date, years_active from PatentsView_20210330.nber_subcategory n left join PatentsView_20210330.nber_category nc on SUBSTR(n.id, 1, 1) = nc.id order by n.id limit {limit} offset {offset};
